title: Code visualizer
description: Visualize the structure and execution flow of JavaScript and C# code as an interactive graph built with React Flow.
features: Turns classes, functions and methods into nodes and edges
Two layout modes (hierarchical and tree) with compact mode
Optimized for mobile and desktop with fullscreen support
